Package net.mdwright.var

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VarCalculator
    Interface for different approaches to VaR calculations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backtest
    Class for performing backtests on VaR models.
    DataManager
    Class for retrieving historical data using the Yahoo Finance API API Used: https://financequotes-api.com/
    EWMAVolatility
    Extension of VolatilityModel for calculating variance with the EWMA approach.
    HistoricalSimVar
    Class for performing complex value at risk calculations using the historical simulation methodology.
    ModelBuildingVar
    Class for performing complex value at risk calculations using the model-building methodology.
    SimpleVolatility
    Extension of VolatilityModel used to calculate variance using the equally-weighted approach.
    VarController
    Controller class for Var Calculations.* Note: influence from Calculator code 2nd Year software Engineering Coursework
    VarMath
    Class for supporting calculations used in value at risk models.
    VarModel
    Class to send calculation requests to appropriate calculating classes.
    ViewController
    Controller class for changing screens at main menu.
    VolatilityModel
    Abstract class for volatility models.
    VolatilityModelFactory
    Factory class for creating VolatilityModels.
